on reading compounds: 皮肉【ヒニク】irony, sarcasm, cynicism, satire, unexpected, different from what one expected, not as one had planned, (only) surface, something superficial, skin and bone, body
表皮【ヒョウヒ】epithelium, skin, rind
上皮【ウワカワ】outer layer (e.g. of skin), cuticle, epidermis, bark, rind, crust, film (on the surface of a liquid), scum, epithelium
kun reading compounds: 皮【かわ】skin, hide, pelt, fur, rind, peel, husk, bark, shell, sheath, wrapping, mask (hiding one's true nature), seeming
